page.title: 02CROPS GROWN AROUND SPALDING
page.content: { FARMING IN THE AREA - CROPS { ___________________________ The main crops grown in the area are generally high value arable crops such as{Vegetables, Wheat and Barley, {Sugar Beet, Potatoes and Flower Bulbs. The reason why these crops are grown here is because of the type of soil and conditions found in this part of England. It is some of the most fertile land in Great Britain. It is for this reason that these high value crops, which demand deep rich soil, can be grown so well. In future years it is extremely unlikely that there is going to a major change in the type of crops being grown here. The price of land in this area is such that farmers cannot afford to grow crops and lesser value if they are to obtain a benefit from their financial investment.
